subject: WARNING; WARNING;DO NOT FOR
body:
WARNING; WARNING;DO NOT FORWARD THIS EMAIL TO ANYONE
[cid:43a89a9f-93e7-4ef3-bae9-d9499204760e]
Scam investigation of the year 2023.
Attention,
Sir/Madam
This office is contacting you based on your long overdue funds debts
findings in this year 2023. Verification's so far proved that you have
spent a lot of money into the hands of many crooks/scammers. Till date
our office after thorough investigations conformed  that all the
promises to you by those scammers that funds will be transferred was
not possible.
Our office is making all our possible efforts to arrest and recover
all the spend money that was collected from you by the
fraudster/crooks. Once the funds are recovered, the funds will be
returned to you. Once you received this email, do kindly reply to
enable our office ask some few questions before proceeding more
further.
Thanks, and do confirm the receipt of this email once you received it.
Regards.
Mr Himamauli Das.
Acting Director US FinCEN.
Email:usficnofce@outlook.com
OR:usfincen2024@gmail.com

subject: Re:    WARNING; WARNING;DO NOT FOR
body:
Hello Mr. Himamauli Das,

Thank you for reaching out and bringing this matter to my attention. I must admit, it's quite alarming to hear about these findings. 

Could you please provide more details about the situation? For instance, how did your office come across my name in relation to these overdue funds debts? Also, could you elaborate on the process of recovering the money that was allegedly taken from me?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Attention; Mr Christopher.
body:
Attention; Mr Christopher.

Sir,

Your email response is well noted, all your information about our overdue
funds payment transaction was gathered through our Global Internet
monitoring security gazettes.To receive the total funds of $14,500.000.00.
To enable proceed on the funds payment processing, kindly fill the
following details as stated below.

Full names..................................................

Address.........................................................

Country of origin...........................................

Age.............................................................

Gender.......................................................

Occupation.................................................

Your telephone Whatsapp number....................................

Thanks and do follow up as advised.

*Mr Himamauli Das*
*Acting Director US FinCEN.*

subject: Re: Attention; Mr Christopher.
body:
Hello Mr. Himamauli Das,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm glad to hear about the overdue funds payment, it's quite a surprise! 

However, before we proceed further, could you please provide me with more information? For instance, how was my name selected for this? And what is the process of receiving these funds?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher
